title: Female labor force participation rates by national per capita income
subtitle: The labor force participation rate corresponds to the proportion of the population ages 15 and older that is economically active. National income levels correspond to GDP per capita in constant international dollars. This means figures are adjusted for inflation and cross-country price differences.

display.name: Female labor force participation rate (%)
display.unit: % of female population ages 15+, modeled ILO estimate

sourceDesc: Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
